resources.string: Just checking to see if any friends are on hike. Won\'t be long, we promise.
Boss, you\'ve got to turn on data to experience hike!
Good News! Your friend is already on hike!
Hey! I\'m using hike, a new free messaging service from Bharti SoftBank. Download the app at http://get.hike.in/ to start messaging me for free!
We\'d love to hear from you...
You\'ve blocked %1$s. Unblock and continue hiking.
How does hike make you feel?
Every month, you get 100 SMS to message friends not on hike.\n\nGet an additional 10 free SMS for each friend that joins hike because of you.
Invite friends, earn more free SMS.
Due to SMS regulations, friends on the Do Not Disturb (DND) list need to opt in to hike to receive your free SMS.
You\'ve run out of free SMS. Invite %1$s to get 10 more!

We can't send %1$s a message as this person is on the DND list. For %1$s to receive hike messages he needs to opt-in to hike by giving a missed call to %2$s.

You'll get an extra 10 free SMS' per month if %1$s opts-in!

To send this information to %1$s as a normal SMS, tap here.
Hey, I\'m using hike to send SMS for free! For you to start receiving messages from hike, I need you to opt-in. Just give a missed call to %1$s.
Tap this button to invite %1$s to hike.
Tap this button for group info.
Learn about free hike SMS. Tap here »
Invite members on SMS to hike
%1$s just joined hike because of you. Great job!
%1$s just joined hike because of you. Great job! As promised, here are your additional 10 free SMS for bringing a friend. To see your total free SMS, tap here.
An update is available. Tap to download now
Critical update available. Tap to download now
Have friends on hike? Don\’t worry about the free SMS, hike to hike is always unlimited!
Tap to share your unique invite URL:
Hi! I\'m using hike, a new messenger from Bharti SoftBank to message friends and family for free! Download it at http://get.hike.in/
You can only have 5 SMS contacts in a group.
You can only have 10 contacts in a group.
Your free hike SMS renews on the 1st of every month.
Get 50 free hike SMS for every friend you invite to hike.
Group chat is free till 30th Sept.\nCredits don\'t apply.

*SMSs that are received and shown in hike are
stored locally and never uploaded to our servers.

We promise.
You can now receive all your SMSs in hike. Tap below to turn this feature on.
